DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to estimate the validity and reliability in the measurement of bicep and tricep tendons and muscular morphologic characteristics by using ultrasound.
DOC.brief_title: Validity and Reliability in Measuring Biceps and Triceps by Using Ultrasound
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subjects Age range from 1935 years History of shoulder or elbow pain which needs medical treatment or surgery
